intro: Metalasia muraltiifolia, commonly known as the muraltiifolia plant, is a species native to specific regions in Southeast Asia. It is a flowering plant belonging to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers and woody stems. It typically grows in shaded, moist environments, often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
